attributes.action: introduce legislation aimed at forcing highstreet businesses to become more environmentally friendly by using less power at times when no one is on the premises through turning off unecessary lighting and appliances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is increasingly put on the individual to make changes in their lifestyles etc to help prevent climate change, yet every highstreet is illuminated through the night for no good reason. Although everyone needs to do their bit, a lot more could be achieved by making highstreet shops turn the lights out when no one is there.
